Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI didn't really understand the marking criteria, especially compared to my teachers. It couldn't mark a lot of work at once (e.g., if I put in my whole essay it struggled to mark it). The predicted marks were much different than the marks I recieved.  However AI was really good when I provided short examples. (e.g., "tell me if this paragraph matches this criteria).

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Not really. GenAI made me confused. I guess sometimes teachers can be a bit harsh but it doesn't bother me if the feedback is constructive.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: They were usually very different. For example, AI would tell me to be more consicse on a point while my teacher would tell me to expand.
